pageContent: Objective: To describe relationships between use of the Personal Patient Profile-Prostate (P3P) decision support system and patient characteristics, and perceived preparation for decision making (PrepDM), satisfaction and decisional regret in the context of prostate cancer treatment choice.

metaData.source:
Advances in systemic therapies for metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25471035/
